SELECT ACTIVITY_NO, MEMBER_NO, ACTIVITY_IMG, ACTIVITY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(ACTIVITY_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS ACTIVITY_DATE FROM ACTIVITY_LOG WHERE ACTIVITY_NO = #{activityNo}
